arts.ttl: Late own goal hands Freiburg victory after Nikola Vasilj heroics for St. Pauli
arts.sum: Nikola Vasilj's stellar performance, including a penalty save, was undone by Philipp Treu's unfortunate 88th-minute own goal as Freiburg edged past St. Pauli in a tightly contested match at the Millerntor-Stadion. Nikola Vasilj celebrates after making a crucial save, keeping St. Pauli in the game against Freiburg.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bochum and Gladbach, Wolfsburg and Freiburg snatch late winners
arts.sum: Across the Bundesliga this afternoon, Bochum picked up a fantastic derby win against Borussia Dortmund, whilst Borussia Mönchengladbach, Wolfsburg and Freiburg all took three points.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli opt to suspend playing of controversial club anthem
arts.sum: Bundesliga side St. Pauli – two weeks after making a principled political statement in the pre-match buildup to their last home fixture – are making more changes ahead of kick-offs…

arts.ttl: USMNT's Sands eyes WC spot after St. Pauli move
arts.sum: The 24-year-old Sands, who joined St. Pauli on loan from New York City FC in January, has made six league appearances for his new team, and has played the full 90 minutes in his last three games, suggesting he has already become a key player for coach Alexander Blessin. New York City FC's first academy pro, Sands has already made 13 appearances for the U.S., helping the team win the 2021 Gold Cup after making his debut in the opening game against Haiti .

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Freiburg preview: Visitors targeting third successive win
arts.sum: Freiburg will look to claim a third consecutive victory when they travel to Millerntor-Stadion for Saturday’s Bundesliga meeting with St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: 'It's very cool to be a part of’ -- James Sands on what makes St. Pauli special, his January loan from NYCFC, and USMNT World Cup hopes
arts.sum: Sands is only a few weeks into his St. Pauli experience, and it's clear that those bells have only spurred him on. The American midfielder has lept right into the club's starting XI, helping St. Pauli pick up points in three of his last four starts to push for Bundesliga survival.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
